entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as a character who has been taking things from Harry. He is described as having a stash of stuff in his cupboard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is trying to get something back from Kreacher. He is described as running down the stairs with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is thundering along behind him as they run downstairs.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is thundering along behind him as they run downstairs.

entities.name: sirius's mother
entities.description: Sirius's mother is a portrait that wakes up when the trio passes through the hall. She screams at them for being mudbloods and scum.
